Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The flat, smooth surface of the $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief){? | $(this.trait:surface:material) | has been lain with a slab of $(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:color) $(this.trait:surface:material). Typically crafted from the same material as the rest of the furniture, the countertop of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief) has instead been covered end to end in $(this.trait:surface:color)$(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:material), lending a varied taste of opulence to the $(this.trait:brief)}.

The flat, smooth surface of the $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief){? | $(this.trait:surface:material) | has been lain with a slab of $(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:color) $(this.trait:surface:material). Typically crafted from the same material as the rest of the furniture, the countertop of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief) has instead been covered end to end in $(this.trait:surface:color)$(this.trait:surface:type) $(this.trait:surface:material), lending a varied taste of opulence to the $(this.trait:brief)}.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "This piece of furniture is a long, flat-topped fixture in a shop or bank across which business is conducted with customers. Alternatively, this type of furniture is sometimes even used in kitchens as a surface on which to prepare foods. This counter boasts three cupboards beneath for storage."

"\{? \| \$(this.trait:surface:material) \|The countertop of the \$(this.trait:material) \$(this.trait:brief) has been covered end to end in \$(this.trait:surface:type)\$(this.trait:surface:color) \$(this.trait:surface:material), lending the furniture a varied taste of opulence.\}"
